metadata.title: CVE-2015-8002 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The chunked upload API (ApiUpload) in MediaWiki before 1.23.11, 1.24.xbefore 1.24.4, and 1.25.x before 1.25.3 allows remote authenticated usersto cause a denial of service (disk consumption) via a file upload using onebyte chunks.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
